reviews.reviewText: Overall I loved it smells amazing, everything that you see in the picture came. When I got my package notice the smell right away. My body wash opened and it was everywhere on the essential oil that came with it , all over the bar of soap. Good thing it wasn't the entire bottle waisted but it was a good chunk of the body wash that was spilled from the poor packaging.The bar of soap is very very very soap good lather but don't be like me and use literally half the bar of soap in 1 shower 🤣😭☠️💯 it's very soapy lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised at the quality of these products! The bar soap smells great, lathers really nice and a little goes a long way. Also was surprised to see that it came with a mesh holder for the bar! The gel cleanser is also amazing and has a nice cooling effect. I was disappointed that the only scent option is rose however it’s a very soft rose scent and I actually really like it! The quality of the oil is also top tier and it does exactly what it’s supposed to do. I’ll definitely purchase again when I run out!
